verbs.description: [ARG0: An attorney] [V: said] [ARGM-LOC: in a filing in federal court] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] [ARG1: that President Donald Trump knew of allegations of sexual misconduct against Eric Schneiderman , the form]
An attorney said in a filing in federal court on Friday that [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: knew] [ARG1: of allegations of sexual misconduct against Eric Schneiderman , the form]
